meanings.sent1: The toy top overspins and falls over quickly.
meanings.sent2: The washing machine overspins when the load is unbalanced.
meanings.sent3: The dancer overspins so much that they end up dizzy!
meanings.sent4: Her mind overspins with worry, like a whirlwind of thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The car overspins around the corner, leaving tire marks on the road.

meanings.definition: The act of spinning or rotating excessively.
meanings.sent1: The overspins of the fan create a cool breeze in the room.
meanings.sent2: The overspins of the merry-go-round made the children giggle.
meanings.sent3: The overspins of the record player make the music sound funny!
meanings.sent4: His story had so many overspins, it was hard to keep track of what really happened.
meanings.sent5: The overspins of the tornado tore through the town, leaving destruction in its wake.
